acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
title: By submitting information, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
body: 1.  You certify that all information provided is true, accurate, and complete to the best of your knowledge. 2.  You acknowledge that providing false or misleading information may result in legal consequences. 3.  You understand that the information you provide may be used for verification purposes and that any discrepancies may result in delays or rejection of your submission. 4.  You agree to indemnify and hold harmless any and all parties involved in processing your submission, including but not limited to the website owner, from any damages, losses, or liabilities that may result from any inaccurate or incomplete information provided by you. 5.  You agree that the website owner may use the information provided by you for the purposes of providing services or products to you. 6.  You understand that the website owner reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time and without notice. 7.  You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when submitting information.
